name: Collectif Alerte Fret Belge
goal: The organisation's goals are to work on the noise situation in Europe by speaking with other experts to improve the European directive 2002/49/CE. We are especially interested in the noise coming from the railways because our Citizen's association is constitued from citizens suffering day-to-day from the noise of the railways.
interests: Agriculture, Environment, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Transport
euInitiatives: European directive 2002/49/CE relating to the assessment and management of environmental noise
